outcome: Underground Activists disrupt systems, prompting civil reformers to propose decentralization.

events.description: Underground activists disable public transport systems, claiming systemic failures as protest against centralized control.
Civil reformers propose a decentralization plan to Council, aiming to empower local governance and reduce systemic risks.
Council debates decentralization, with factions split on the potential impact on stability and control.
Public forums erupt in debate over centralized versus decentralized system models, reflecting wider societal division.
